bibl.title: with contributions by C.F.L. AUSTIN, R.L. FOWLER, E.W. HANDLEY, P.J. PARSONS, P. SCHUBERT, A. SWIDEREK, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXI (Nos 4093-4300). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 81.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXI, 4093-4300. - I. Comedy (4093-4095). - II. Mythographic Texts (4096-4099). - III. Thucydides (4100-4112). - IV. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4113-4132). - V. Astronomical Texts (4133-4300: Descriptive List).
bibl.seg: GAGOS T., M.W. HASLAM and N. LEWIS, with contributions by C.F.L. AUSTIN, R.L. FOWLER, E.W. HANDLEY, P.J. PARSONS, P. SCHUBERT, A. SWIDEREK, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXI (Nos 4093-4300). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 81.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1995, 8°, xii-163 pp. et XII pll. ISBN 0-85698-126-5. £55.
Gagos Haslam Lewis Austin Fowler Handley Parsons Schubert Swiderek
